snippet: The police in Zanzibar said they had arrested 15 people in connection to a spate of acid attacks in recent months and that some had links to terrorist groups.
abstract: Police in Zanzibar say they have arrested 15 people in connection with spate of acid attacks; Police Comr Mussa Ali Mussa claims some suspects have links to Al Qaeda and Somali Islamist extremist group Shabab, but he offers no evidence to support statement, which some analysts dispute.
lead_paragraph: The police in Zanzibar said they had arrested 15 people in connection to a spate of acid attacks in recent months and that some had links to terrorist groups.

headline.main: Tanzania Says 15 Are Linked to Acid Attacks
headline.print_headline: Tanzania Says 15 Are Linked To Acid Attacks
